modName: Sleek Steel  UNPB BBP Dark Edition
summary: This is a conversion of the Sleek Steel Stand-Alone Armor for the UNPB body with BBP. All credit goes to the original authors.
descriptionHtml:
[size=24pt][color=orange]Sleek Steel - UNPB BBP[/color][/size]

====

Req: Female Body that uses ([color=purple]BBP[/color]) UNPB - [color=red]preferred[/color]



INTRODUCTION

First and foremost , [color=red]I have been given permission[/color].

This is a conversion of the Sleek Steel Stand-Alone Armor for the UNPB body with BBP
